episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch03:
I saw you listening intently in class today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]—as always!

I suppose that means you’re learning at a
good pace?
Hmm... You don’t look confident about that.

Well, it’s no good to just ignore things you’re
unsure of.
So what do you say? Want to study together?
I’ve helped a friend with his classes before!
Then let’s get to it!
Hmm...

Studying can take its toll if we don’t mix things up
a bit.
I know! I’ll quiz you!
Studying’s more fun if you make it a game!
Let’s start with an easy one. Question one!

What’s the name of the academy that I, Lacey,
attend?
(Answer “Naranja Academy.”)

Hmm?! Oh no, what a shame. That’s not the
right school at all!

I go to Blueberry Academy! I hope you remember
next time!
(Answer “Blueberry Academy.”)

Ding ding ding! You got it! I’m glad you
remembered!
Just keep the right answers coming!
Now then...let’s move on to the next question!
Well, that’s it for my quiz!
I’d love to study together again sometime!

Huh? You want to thank me somehow?
Oh, that’s not necessary!
But...I suppose if you’re offering...

I know—would you help me search for cute things
around Pasio?

[Name:PlayerNickname ] searched with Lacey
for cute things around Pasio.

We sure found a lot of cute things! Definitely time
well spent!

But...there’s just one thing that’s been nagging
at me.

Tell me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Have you
just been agreeing with whatever I say is cute?
(Tell her truthfully you were.)
Yeah, I thought so. You didn’t seem very confident.

(Admit you don’t know much about
cuteness.)
I see... I thought that might be it.

But opening up to me like that... Yes, I think that
was a fine idea!
I suppose you were trying to consider my feelings.

But what I really wanted to know is what YOU
think is cute, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Don’t worry about what I think. I want you to find
your own definition!

Look, I’m the type of person who just comes right
out and says what they’re thinking.

I got my straightforwardness from my dad,
and when I think something’s not right, I say it.

I am what I am, but I hope you’ll still be
my friend!

Now then! We’ve confirmed you’re a thoughtful
person, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
so let’s get back to our search for cuteness!

And this time, please share your own version with
me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
